_sText:
Don't be tricked into the illusion of free will.

This is the fixed version, if you have the old version, please re-download

This Deathrun is loosely themed on the Dark Energy level of Half Life 2, it has 17 traps and 2 mgs with 77 CT spawns, and 2 T. The map also has 3 secret grenades. The map is very big (so donÃ¯Â¿Â½t get lost) and is quite ambient. The traps are:

Regular Traps


1. Pit of lightning
2. Hanging electrical wires
3. Falling cargo walkway
4. Underwater garbage crushers
5. Slippery steps
6. Brocken glass platform
7. Breaking walkway
8. Fiery people crusher
9. Light wall
10. Triple crushers
11. Slow-mo break floor jump


Virtual Reality Room


12. Brick wall attack
13. Prison gas chamber


Regular Traps


14. Darkness explosion
15. Reactor power overload
16. Revenge of the statues
17. Fly floor panels

The Minigames at the end of this map are:


1. Terrorist execution
2. Knife arena
3. Old


Hope you like it!
